content: Another great money mindset quote is by Jim Rohn: "Formal education will make you a living, self-education will make you a fortune." This quote emphasizes the importance of continuous learning and personal development in building wealth and financial success. It suggests that while formal education can provide you with the skills to make a living, it's the ongoing self-education and learning that can lead to greater financial abundance and success. So, never stop learning and investing in yourself, as it can be the key to unlocking greater wealth and prosperity.
